name: p2
description: high priority, will be elevated to p1 when there are no p1 items

name: p3
description: important, but not critical to our end users or infra

name: a11y
description: accessibility documentation or general user interface issues regarding accessibility

name: localisation
description: improved localisation tooling or of interest to localisers

name: idle
description: there has been no activity, either address or close

name: needs triage
description: automatically added to new issues, response needed within a week

name: community
description: issues, discussions, and pull requests opened by the community

name: need info
description: the author or a collaborator has requested additional information

name: good first issue
description: issues intentionally kept open for first time contributors

name: on hold
description: there is currently a dependency that is blocking progress

name: enhancement
description: new agreed upon features or enhancement to existing content or infra

name: github_actions
description: automatically added by dependabot for github action updates

name: dependencies
description: automatically added by dependabot for dependency updates

name: documentation
description: updates or additions to documentation and content
